outline:
1. to seal, seal up, affix a seal
    1. (Qal)
      1. to seal, affix one's seal
      2. to seal up, fasten up by sealing
    2. (Niphal) to seal
    3. (Piel) to lock up
    4. (Hiphil) to be stopped
kjv_def: make an end, mark, seal (up), stop.
strongs_def: to close up; especially to seal
